Angel

item.title: How do I dedicate a server?
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

No, the servers that are commonly downloaded today and used are not programmed correctly. When winter love was made it was just a base. Then xero built off it. He did not have in mind memory usage of the server. Servers that were made from xero’s server use around 200k memory for about 20 ppl. He also had no since of how to arrange the server. If you want to make something good then use a winterlove source, make event handlers and trim down the classes that is recreated for each player.

Edit: When i wrote this there was over 110 ppl on my server with no lag.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I dedicate a server?

item.title: How do I dedicate a server?
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Also you would need to make sure your server doesn’t crash. Pretty much every source you download here will fill up with nulls and crash because the people who wrote them didn’t think anything would connect but a real client (And that the login would go perfect, like in the movies :rolleyes:)

Read full topic
